# Interface CustomNodeProps

Configuration for a `CustomNode`.

#### Remarks

If no `id` is provided, one will be auto-generated based on the class name. The `reportToClient` flag defaults to `false`.

#### Param: executionConfig

Execution configuration for the custom node.

interface CustomNodeProps {  
id?: string;  
reportToClient?: boolean;  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/dsl/nodes/builtin/custom_node.CustomNodeProps))

  * [AbstractNodeProps](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNodeProps)
    * CustomNodeProps



##### Index

### Properties

id? reportToClient?

## Properties

### `Optional`id

id?: string

Optional explicit node identifier.

#### Remarks

If omitted, a stable auto-generated ID based on the class name is assigned.

Inherited from [AbstractNodeProps](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNodeProps).[id](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNodeProps#id)

### `Optional`reportToClient

reportToClient?: boolean

Whether this node should report its outputs to the client.

#### Remarks

Useful for telemetry/debugging. Defaults to `false`.

Inherited from [AbstractNodeProps](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNodeProps).[reportToClient](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNodeProps#reporttoclient)
